question: We bought a box of cherry. Take __________ (some / any) with you when you leave.

question: 和some, any用法一样，带有some的复合不定代词一般用于肯定句和请求语气的句子中，带有any的复合不定代词一般用于否定句、疑问句。
含有some的复合不定代词也可用于疑问句中，表示请求、建议和反问等。
含有any的复合不定代词也可以用于肯定句中，表示“任何人”或“任何事”的意思。
He can’t give you __________ (some / any) help at present.
There is ___________ (something / anything) in the flower. I think it is a bee.
Our trip to Taiwan was perfect. __________ (nothing / everything) went on well.
I am thirsty. I would like to have ___________ (anything / something) to drink, please.
There is __________ in your pocket. Oh, it is a key.
Your parents can’t do ___________ for you. You should do it yourself.
They can hardly see ___________ in this village. What happened to the villagers?
There isn’t ___________ milk in the fridge. Let’s go to buy ___________ .
I am a new student in the school. I know _________ here and I feel lonely.
Can ___________ (everybody / anybody) hear me? A snake here!
He would do ___________ (nothing / anything) for you. He loves you deeply.

question: 变化趋势描述；
简要原因分析
twelve ________

然而，在六月份，游客量降至最低水平，为25万人次。 (…, the number of visitors fell to its lowest level at…)
从六月份到八月份，游客量显著增长，从25万人次上升到42万人次。(…, there was a significant increase...)
与九月相比，十月份的游客量是36万人次，略高于九月份的30万人次。 (…, which was slightly higher than...)
总体来看，七月和八月的游客最多，主要因为那时是暑假。(Overall, …had the most visitors, mainly because….)
这四个词的前面如果有具体数字, 就要用单数形式, 后面接可数名词的复数。
如果这四个词的前面没有具体数字, 那么他们的后面要加上s + of, 接可数名词的复数。
如果后面是“the+名词复数”, 就要用“具体数字 + 这四个计数单位 + of。
in + 基数词, 表示在某年”。如: in 2016 在2016年。
in+ the + 基数词复数, 表示“在....年代”。如:in the 1870s 在19世纪70年代。
用两个基数词可以表示具体时刻。3:25 表达为：at three twenty-five

question: the ＋形容词原级, 谓语动词用复数，指一类人或物。
the ＋形容词比较级，指两者中“较…的”的那一个。
a/ an ＋形容词比较级
a＋most＋形容词最高级 “一个非常…”
原级比较：肯定句 as….as…., 否定句not so / as….as…..
比较句：比较级＋than….或more (less) ….than…..
比较级＋ and＋比较级 或 more and more＋原级 “越来越… ”
The＋比较级..., the＋比较级... “越…，越…” 如：
比较级＋than any other＋n.(单)(适用于同一范围)
倍数表达法。用times 表倍数通常用于三倍以上，两倍可以用twice或double.
A is three(four, etc.) times the size (height, length etc.) of B.
A is three(four, etc.) times as big(high, long, etc.) as B.
A is three (four, etc.) times bigger (higher, longer, etc.) than B.
最高级＋of/ in/ among….

question: 他不只是一位文豪，还是一位发明家。(not only..., but also... )
answer: He is not only a great writer, but also an inventor.

answer: Without doubt, China is much better at making high-technology products now.

question: ________ cold weather, it is better to warm your car up before running it.
answer: We shouldn’t depend on mobile phones too much.

question: 电话是最重要的发明，因为它改变了人们远距离沟通的方式。(the most... because...)

发明物特征外形;
相关用途;
好处和总结。
它由环保材料制成，所以对环境很友好。(It is made from…, so it’s...)
首先，它使用起来非常方便，通过手机APP就能轻松控制它。(First, it is convenient to…by…)
It is made from eco-friendly materials, so it’s good for the environment.
First, it is convenient to use by controlling it through an app on your phone.
此外，当你启动它时，它会利用传感器寻找垃圾并清扫到垃圾箱里。(Besides, when…, it uses sensors to....)
我想到这个主意是因为我想让忙碌的人们打扫变得更轻松。(I came up with this idea because...)
Besides, when you turn it on, it uses sensors to find trash and sweeps it into a bin.
I came up with this idea because I wanted to make cleaning easier for busy people.
不规则变化
单音节不规则变化
两种变化
as (否定句中可用so) + adj／adv + as …，意为：···和···一样。如：
as ... as用于倍数表达，倍数置于第一个as之前，即，倍数+ as ... as + 其他。如：
as + many / much + 名词 + as 如：
as much / deep / tall / heavy ...+ as + 数量(表度量衡、时间), 用以强调而非比较，意为 “多达···, 深达..., 高达···, 重达···”等。如：
